extendedIngredients.name: canned beets
extendedIngredients.original: 1 (15 ounce) can sliced beets with liquid

title: Quick Pickled Eggs and Beets
summary: Quick Pickled Eggs and Beets is a gluten free, dairy free, and vegetarian recipe with 8 servings. One portion of this dish contains approximately 6g of protein, 4g of fat, and a total of 149 calories. For 47 cents per serving, this recipe covers 6% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. Not a lot of people made this recipe, and 1 would say it hit the spot. It is brought to you by Allrecipes. It works well as a very reasonably priced side dish. A mixture of vinegar, water, ground cinnamon, and a handful of other ingredients are all it takes to make this recipe so tasty. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes roughly 4 hours and 30 minutes. Taking all factors into account, this recipe earns a spoonacular score of 18%, which is not so tremendous. Similar recipes include Quick Pickled Beets, Pickled Eggs with Beets, and Pickled Eggs and Beets.
instructions: Place egg in a saucepan and cover with cold water. Bring water to a boil and immediately remove from heat. Cover and let eggs stand in hot water for 10 to 12 minutes. Remove from hot water, cool, and peel. Place eggs in a glass or plastic container.                            In a saucepan, combine beets, vinegar, sugar, water and cinnamon. Bring to a boil, and stir until sugar is dissolved. Pour over eggs. Cover, and chill for 4 hours or overnight.                                                Kitchen-Friendly View

steps.step: Place egg in a saucepan and cover with cold water. Bring water to a boil and immediately remove from heat. Cover and let eggs stand in hot water for 10 to 12 minutes.
Remove from hot water, cool, and peel.
Place eggs in a glass or plastic container.
In a saucepan, combine beets, vinegar, sugar, water and cinnamon. Bring to a boil, and stir until sugar is dissolved.
Pour over eggs. Cover, and chill for 4 hours or overnight.
